document_data.caption: Cover of ''Final Gate''.
document_data.title: Final Gate
document_data.author: [[Richard Baker]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Final Gate''''' is a novel by [[Richard Baker]] and the third and final book in [[The Last Mythal]] trilogy.

{{quote|''[[Araevin Teshurr|ARAEVIN]] has gained too much power too fast, and the price of what will be both blessing and curse will be higher than any mere [[elf]] can pay.''

''[[Sarya Dlardrageth|SARYA]] has opened wounds so old and so deep no one will ever be able to close them, but the question must be asked: Should they be closed at all?''

''[[Cormanthyr|CORMANTHYR]] is an empire lost to the mists of ancient history, but the memory of elves is long, and the glory of the forest kingdom has not been forgotten.''}}
